title: Ep. 114 - Advice From One Of The Best Market Timers
itunes:title: Advice From One Of The Best Market Timers
description: Jeff Clark, editor of the S&A Short Report, gives important advice for traders looking to go long or short the market right now.  Frank talks about the biggest trend taking place in the energy industry.
